import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { singleMovie } from '../actions' import '../css/NavBar.css' const InMovie = (props) => { const movieID = props.match.params.id const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(singleMovie(movieID)) },[]) const getSingle = useSelector((state) => state.singleMovie) return (

{getSingle?.original_title}

Üye
Puanları

Özet

Hayri Pıtır

Chris Columbus

Director

) } export default InMovie;
